knimeNode.name: Slimm2Krona
knimeNode.shortDescription: Conversion of a Slimm profile to Krona compatible text format.

ports.outPort: Output file in Krona text format. [tsv,Inactive]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of Slimm2Krona.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of Slimm2Krona. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
